item.description:
Hello!

My name is Luis Cacho I am a Computer Systems Engineer. I define myself as a Linux enthusiast who loves to work and experiment with Open Source technologies while I am learning about it and trying to apply best practices and my problem solving skills.

I am currently working as a Linux System Administrator in Rackspace headquarters, based in San Antonio, TX, US.

I like share the expertise that I have acquired trougth the years in this blog.
